attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Your signature would serve to stop the court ordered sexual abuse of children* and to hold judges accountable for their actions and lack of in regard to ensuring that children are not being placed in harms way. Jan Goodwin who wrote an item on court ordered child sexual abuse, ended her article  by stating; "And that tragedy will repeat itself again and again until we stop looking the other way."

*Judges are knowingly placing children in custody of parents or people who abuse their children. We need to stop this mis justice from happening. Please sign this, it could happen to someone you know...

rejection.details: This petition needs to be redrafted so it's clearer for people to understand what they're signing up for.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
